title: Fiora's ulti is pretty overpowered.
body:
If I haven't dominated her into the ground, I'm scared of her by level 9. Even if I'm playing Gnar, the kite based God with CC, mega Gnar and leaps I'm still terrified of her.

The amount of times I've seen a Fiora turn what looks like an easy kill into 3 dead people with like Tiamat and Vamp sceptre is amazing.

Like she procs that ulti so fast. The old Fiora was pretty OP but the new one is insane.

replies.body: For Fiora to produce her ulti she needs to hit all 4 sides of the selected champion so when she targets a champion gt them out why she goes ham over that one failing to produce it then she dies by the rest because she targeted one out of 3 or 4.

> [{quoted}](name=mutley,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=eYsMwlrn,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-11T14:28:58.843+0000)
>
> For Fiora to produce her ulti she needs to hit all 4 sides of the selected champion so when she targets a champion gt them out why she goes ham over that one failing to produce it then she dies by the rest because she targeted one out of 3 or 4.

I wish we could get the person out lol. She's got a massive slow, just Ulti's, Q's to the top side of you and Hit's E then runs to the bottom side and then Q's for the last spot (in most cases) and in like 2.0 seconds she is healing for hundreds and whoever she ulted is half dead or almost dead.
